The place is extremely cool. It has a big 2 outside seating place. It works Self-service. Downstairs there are wc.  it has 2 cashpoints, that you can order. They make good coffee. Very popular and trendy point in the middle of Stuttgart.

Stylish location, really good coffee, croissants, lemon cake, Donauwelle, Madeleines and the right crowd to enjoy an Apéro after work or on weekends. Don‘t miss the delicious appetizers the TATTI team comes up with each Thursday from 6pm on.
